title.@value: Problem with transitions of care, hand offs, or handovers without injury or harm

definition.@value: Miscommunication, errors, or no communication when changing setting of care from one patient care unit, department, or institution to another

label.@value: Problem associated with transitions of care, hand offs, or handovers
Problem with transitions of care, hand offs, or handovers without injury or harm
miscommunication between healthcare providers without documented injury or harm
lack of communication between healthcare providers without documented injury or harm
